Html:
Thank you for all the hard work you have put into this project. Please take a look at my hiking club website first built with the original starter kit, I then ommited the news and events sections beause of all the bugs. My site now uses your latest build. I have more work to do but I really think that your project contains some nice work and features and I cannot thank you enough. It makes me look great as our club webmaster.

For the future maybe others could get involved in creating more themes.

Thank you again.

Temporary until I change the DNS.

http://sahcinfo.org.ultimahosts.net/
Anyone is welcome to send themes over... it would really help the project out!
